descriptionlist.description:
An uncomplicated tweak notifies you of an attempt to steal or jailbreak your device. When someone other than you types the password incorrectly, No2Theft3 will immediately take a photo of the thief and send you an SMS or email. At the same time, an audible signal is activated, which can scare off any thief.
Not a bad solution if you think someone is secretly taking your phone..
